greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = number of times (n-1) occurs in the fundamental period of Fibonacci numbers modulo n.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: f _ (x : xs) z = f x xs (z + 0 ^ (n - 1 - x))
ps = 1 : 1 : zipWith (\u v -> (u + v) `mod` n) (tail ps) ps
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 17 2014
